Reviews.Title: Very nice product that met expectations
Reviews.Author: Nikole Adkins
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal at $550 for the product I received and is of excellent quality.  Everything is as expected.  Now if I can only get used to Windows 8!

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: tibaldo
Reviews.Content: Is an amazing computer, the monitor is as big as needed for my photography business. Very light for the size also fast and powerfull

Reviews.Title: returned this unit
Reviews.Author: woodpenturner
Reviews.Content: Probably a good machine I just did not want it since I left Dell and now work for another company. I found an Acer for a lot less money!

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-4200U Processor 1.6 GHz
6 GB DDR3
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 17 i17RV-5454BLK 17.3-Inch Laptop (Black)
